title: Tooltip Bug when lvling up Twitchs Q

embed.title: Gyazo
embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: While playing an ARAM i noticed, that the Infobox for leveling up Twitchs Q says, that the duration gets increased by x%. It is supposed to say x sec. I am sure its nothing that influences the game in anyway, but it is a lil annoying to see anyway :P
